sense.def:
An election
je postopek, pri katerem ljudje na volitvah izberejo človeka ali skupino ljudi za uradne položaje.

seg.quote: Labour did badly in the election.
I may vote for her at the next election.

sense.def:
The election of a person or a political party
je uspeh neke osebe ali politične stranke pri zmagi na volitvah.

seg.quote: ...the election of Mr Heath's government in 1970.
